about.title: Craftsmanship · Focus
about.text: Established in 1997, Optik Imej has been a trusted pillar of vision care in the Batu Pahat community for nearly three decades. From our humble beginnings to 2026, we have remained dedicated to blending traditional craftsmanship with modern optical technology. We believe eyewear is not just a tool for vision correction, but an extension of your personal style.
about.subtext: At Optik Imej, we provide professional optometry services and a curated selection of global fashion eyewear, serving generations of customers with integrity and expertise.

services.title: Expert · Service
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Vision Care Solutions
services.exam_desc: Comprehensive vision testing and eye health assessment using advanced equipment.
services.lenses_desc: Blue light blocking, Photochromic (auto-darkening), Night anti-glare, Progressives & more.

services.brands_desc: We can order any specific brand or model, including Ray-Ban, just for you.
services.warranty_desc: All glasses come with a 1-year warranty (excluding human damage) for your peace of mind.

whyus.text: Since 1997 in Parit Sulong, Optik Imej has earned the trust of three generations of customers through sincere service. We don't just provide eyewear - we offer professional vision solutions and lasting aftercare.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do I need an appointment for an eye exam?
faq.a1: No appointment is needed. Walk-ins are welcome during business hours. We recommend visiting during off-peak hours (weekday mornings) for a more relaxed eye exam experience.
faq.q2: How long does it take to get my glasses?
faq.a2: Common prescriptions and standard lenses can be ready in as fast as 2 hours. Special lenses (progressive, photochromic) depend on specific requirements.
faq.q3: Is there a warranty on the glasses?
faq.a3: All glasses come with a 1-year warranty covering normal use issues for frames and lenses. Human damage is not covered.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept cash, major credit/debit cards, and e-wallets such as Touch n Go eWallet.
